text: Will.i.am Music Group is a record label. It is owned and founded by hip-hop artist Will.i.am of the Black Eyed Peas. Other than Will.i.am, there are popular artists such as Fergie, Macy Gray and Sergio Mendes signed to the label. ==Artists== *Will.i.am *Fergie *Black Eyed Peas *Macy Gray *Sergio Mendes *Taboo *apl.de.ap *Keithian *Girls, Girls, Girls *Paper-Boys Category:American record labels Category:Black Eyed Peas
title: Will.i.am Music Group
